DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to collect tissue samples that may aid in the treatment and learning about various oncology diagnosis.
DOC.brief_title: Consent for Obtaining Additional Tissue at the Time of a Diagnostic Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to provide a mechanism to obtain tissue specimens to be used for experimental studies before the exact histologic diagnosis is known.
DOC.criteria: Subjects who are having a tissue procedure done as part of their standard oncology workup will be eligible to be consented on this study.
